Introduction

About Me

My name is Sahil Bhowmick, a Web Developer with a B.Tech in Computer Science, with a strong interest in Front-End development. I specialize in creating responsive and user-friendly websites with a focus on clean design and modern web technologies. I bring creative ideas to life through code, crafting seamless digital experiences that leave a lasting impression.

  • Languages

    HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, TypeScript

  • Education

    B.Teach in Computer Science and Engineering

  • Projects

    I have built several Front-End projects, including a Keeper app, a Weather site, and an E-commerce site.
